summary: This is a Facelift improvement for NPC of skyrim. Currently Nord female are effected but not everyone
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#FF0000][size=5]BEFORE YOU DOWNLOAD PLEASE SEE THE DESCRIPTION, IT\'S IMPORTANT,IF YOU DIDN\'T READ AND INSTALL, IT WILL CAUSE YOUR SKYRIM CRASH UPON LOAD![/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg694/scaled.php?server=694&filename=word1j.png&res=landing[/img]

This is NPC new and improved facelift mod, have you even wonder when you travel around Skyrim to find pretty women and handsome man but instead find most of female or male NPC all have ugly faces, have you feel they should have a face make over, so here a mod to do that instead of you going to creation kit to edit all the NPC why not let this mod help you do the changes. 

The Mod itself does not include Hair pack, so please download it first before installing this mod. (Check below for more information in “Requirement”)

[b][color=#a9a9a9][size=2]================================================================================================================================[/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg805/scaled.php?server=805&filename=word3.png&res=landing[/img]

The mod do not include texture so please go and download it, I will provide you link so you do know what to download.

Female Face, hair and Body Texture Needed

Body Mod for Female just pick one (please make sure to install this mod first before you install the one below)
[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente[/size][/color][/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/]Link[/url]
[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/size][/color][/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/]Link[/url]

[b][color=#FFA500][size=3]Note: This is needed and I telling you this without it, YOU WILL HAVE NECK SEAM PROBLEM IF YOU KNOW WHAT I MEAN![/size][/color][/b]

Hair Mod (it a Must to Install before you install mine mod)
[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/size][/color][/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/]Link[/url]

[b][color=#FFA500][size=3]Note: Make sure you install Apachii Sky Hair 1.5 and 1.3 for female and 1.1 for male, plus please get their fixes recommend[/size][/color][/b]

For Male Only (optional but bring out better effect for male character)
[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Better Male –beautiful nudes and faces – new hairstyle by Chris57 and Flavoredsoul[/size][/color][/b] [http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488/]Link[/url]

\"Face and Body mod\" (optional but will look exactly the same as the picture shown)
[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Mature skin texture and body for UNP CBBE ADEC by Maevan2[/size][/color][/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32986/]Link[/url]

[b][color=#FFA500][size=3]Note: you may not need to follow my \"face and body mod\"[/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg404/scaled.php?server=404&filename=word7.png&res=landing[/img]

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]BLEAK ENB - UNBLEAK ENB by akiro[/size][/color][/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24828/]Link[/url]

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Modder Resource - Easy NPC Creation by AmethystDeceiver[/size][/color][/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17018/]Link[/url]

[b][color=#a9a9a9][size=2]================================================================================================================================[/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg560/scaled.php?server=560&filename=word2.png&res=landing[/img]

Extract the content of the archive and then put the esp into your Skyrim/Data along with meshes and texture, lastly enable the mod from your Skyrim.exe

it will be an easy installation using NMM (Nexus Mod Manager or Bain or any other mod manager)

BSA version just dump the esp and bsa into Skyrim/Data Folder

Uninstall
Delete the Textue and Meshes in the facegenData along with the esp in your skyrim/data 
Location of the texture and meshes facegenData file
(Skyrim/data/texture/actors/character/facegendata/facetint/skyrim.esm)  (Skyrim/data/meshes/actors/character/facegendata/facetint/skyrim.esm)

[b][color=#a9a9a9][size=2]================================================================================================================================[/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg201/scaled.php?server=201&filename=word6.png&res=landing[/img]

The mod has no current conflict with any mod known of.

Please be sure not to install mod that changes NPC face texture and meshes or else you will have a black head NPC.

If your NPC appears naked just disable them using console command and re-enable them again will get them to redress what they needed to.

[b][color=#a9a9a9][size=2]================================================================================================================================[/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg708/scaled.php?server=708&filename=word9.png&res=landing[/img]

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Q: My NPC appear with a different hair or appear bald, is something wrong? [/size][/color][/b]
A: That mean you never read what is require and install without thinking look at the \"requirement\" for detail

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Q: -Part 1- Can this mod go together with other NPC mod such as Interesting NPCs by Kris Takahashi?[/size][/color][/b]
A: Yes it can be install together no conflict at all since the author created those NPC from Scatch which didn\'t change any of the original NPC.

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Q: -Part 2- Can this mod go together with other NPC mod such as ApachiiSkyHair NPC Overhaul by Spewed?[/size][/color][/b]
A: No it cant due to the fact the mod create using original NPC face will conflict with mine causing black head missing texture or worst floating head.

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Q: I have a mod call UFO (Ultimate Follower Overhaul) install, will it conflict with it?[/size][/color][/b]
A: No it will not or any other follower mod that don\'t modify faces of the NPC.

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Q: I load your Mod and it crash upon loading. how to solves this problem?[/size][/color][/b]
A: The same thing you never read what is require and install without thinking look at the \"requirement\" for detail. If it still crash, kindly report me in your comment.

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Q: Can I make a request from you to help me make other NPC[/size][/color][/b]
A: 1. Include the NPC name 2. Include how you want the NPC to look like 3. send it to my inbox

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Q: Hey you make a mod that look crap and you suck at what you doing![/size][/color][/b]
A: Just keep it to yourself, If you don\'t like it, Don\'t install it, I don\'t have time to bother about your insult or bad comment.

[b][color=#a9a9a9][size=2]================================================================================================================================[/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg94/scaled.php?server=94&filename=word4u.png&res=landing[/img]

May 1st 2013
Include only Female Nord first

[b][color=#a9a9a9][size=2]================================================================================================================================[/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg534/scaled.php?server=534&filename=word8.png&res=landing[/img]

Thank to all People who made many kind of Mod to make a Better SKYRIM gameplay and those who endorse this mod. I thank you...
author: Redstudio
